affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 动词后缀, 与…相关的动作或结果

bilingual.source: We have known each other for a decade.
bilingual.target: 我们已经认识了十年了。

bilingual.source: He spent a decade writing this book.
bilingual.target: 他花了十年时间写完这本书。

bilingual.source: Their marriage has lasted for a decade.
bilingual.target: 他们的婚姻已经持续了十年。

bilingual.source: This year has been the wettest in a decade.
bilingual.target: 今年是十年来最湿的一年。

bilingual.source: She has been working at the company for a decade.
bilingual.target: 她在这家公司工作了十年。

bilingual.source: The pollution worsened over the past decade.
bilingual.target: 在过去的十年里，污染恶化了。

bilingual.source: The case has been unsolved for over a decade.
bilingual.target: 这个案件已经未解决超过十年了。

bilingual.source: The tech industry boomed in the last decade.
bilingual.target: 在过去的十年里，科技行业繁荣了。

bilingual.source: Their friendship has a standing of over a decade.
bilingual.target: 他们的友谊持续时间超过十年。

bilingual.source: In the past decade, technology has advanced rapidly.
bilingual.target: 过去的十年里，科技发展迅速。

list.abstract: decade（英 [ˈdekeɪd]，美 [ˈdekeɪd]），英语单词，名词，意思为十年时间；十年；十个组成的一套（或一系列、一组）尤指。短语搭配有over the past decade（在过去的十年里）。例句为“Whereas now, I near the end of my fourth decade.（但现如今，我快要四十岁了。）” decade相关近义词有decennium、dix。
《Decade》为日本音乐组合fripSide在2012年12月发行的单曲，收录于fripside的第二张同名专辑《Decade》中。该曲为半串烧性质，出现过之前一些人气歌曲中的旋律或歌词，长达7分多钟，而且伴奏使用了很激烈的电音，具有无比高的比特率。

yingyinNormal.en: Celia has waited over a decade for me to retire. It's her time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 西莉娅为了等我退休已经等了十年多，该轮到她了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, a decade ago, I founded a small nonprofit and I built it into a major global player.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十年前，我成立了个小慈善组织，后来影响力逐渐强大。

yingyinNormal.en: During the last decade, people thought the decline in American manufacturing was inevitable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去十年里，人们一直认为美国制造业的衰退是必然的。

yingyinNormal.en: We've learned more from genetics in the past decade than a century of digging up bones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 相比挖骨头的那个世纪， 过去十年我们从遗传学中学到了更多。

yingyinNormal.en: But they could use hibernation to stretch that making observations on organics over a decade or more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，他们可以用休眠来延长时间，这样对有机体的观察时间可以长达十年或更久。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you believe it? In the past decade, I have spent thousands of dollars in that store, and this is the thanks I get.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能相信吗？在过去十年，我在那家店花了几千块，结果他就这样回报我。

yingyinNormal.en: No one said anything of the kind to Neil Armstrong. The entire nation dedicated a decade of effort and treasure to put a man on the moon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没人对阿姆斯特朗说过这样的话，为了送一个人上月球整个国家做出了十年的努力。

yingyinNormal.en: A decade later, under contract to NASA, SpaceX became the first private company in history to carry supplies to and from the International Space Station.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十年之后，根据NASA的合同，SpaceX公司成为历史上首家搭载供应物资的私营公司，往返于国际空间站。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me put it to you this way. It took us nearly a decade to find Osama Bin Laden. With this, we could locate him anywhere on the planet in a couple of hours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这么跟你说吧，我们花了将近十年才找到本·拉登，但有了这装备，我们在几小时之内就能在这个星球的任何地方找到他。

yingyinNormal.en: Time is a funny thing. A decade can flash by in an uneventful second.
yingyinNormal.zh: 时间弄人，有时十年如一日，一晃就过去了。

yingyinNormal.en: Today, more of our troops are home for the holidays than at any time in over a decade.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天，我们更多的军人可以回到国内度过假期，这比10年来的任何时候都要多。

yingyinNormal.en: Before this decade is out, of landing a man on the moon, and returning him safely to the earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在七零年代之前，让人类成功登月并安全返回地球。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm drawn across the universe to someone I haven't seen in a decade who I know is probably dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我被牵引着穿越星河宇宙，去见一个数年未见的人，一个我知道可能早就死了的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Beijing has transformed enormously over the last decade to meet demand. And some of its old ways have changed, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 过去10年北京已经发生了巨大的变化，来满足人民的需求。一些老的道路也被改变了。

yingyinNormal.en: 40 million Americans without power because someone forgot to trim a tree. Nearly a decade has passed since that epic blackout.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就因为没有修剪树枝，4千万人无法用电。那次事件已经过去了10多年。

yingyinNormal.en: We've actually begun to see some modest wage growth in recent months. But most folks still haven't seen a raise in over a decade.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上，我们在最近几个月，已经开始看到一些适度的工资增长。但大部分人仍然在十多年来没能见到工资地上涨。

yingyinNormal.en: And after a decade of losing jobs, American manufacturing is once again adding them more than 700,000 over the past four and a half years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在丧失就业岗位10多年后，美国制造业的岗位又一次增加了，在过去的四年半时间里，增加了70余万个就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: And for the first time in over a decade, business leaders worldwide have declared two years running that the number one place to invest isn't China, it's America.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十多年来，第一次有全球的商界领袖宣称，美国连续两年超越中国成为全球最具投资价值的国家。

yingyinNormal.en: In more than a decade of war, this 9/11 Generation has worked with the Afghan people to help them reclaim their communities and prevent terrorist attacks against our own country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在10多年的战争中，这9/11的一代人和阿富汗人民一道帮助他们改造他们的社会，并阻止针对我们自己国家的恐怖袭击。

yingyinNormal.en: I just need to reorder some promotional Frisbees, and say a quick hi to Merv, the genius who supplied me with coasters and key chains for over a decade. He even put my face on a pillow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是需要再订一些宣传用的飞盘，顺便和梅尔夫打声招呼。这位天才在过去十多年里，一直帮我做杯垫和钥匙链，他甚至还把我的脸印在枕头上呢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: This week, it asked the five most valuable US tech companies for information about their many small acquisitions over the past <highlight>decade</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本周，它（联邦贸易委员会）询问了美国市值最高的五家科技公司，关于它们在过去十年中的许多小规模收购的相关信息。

examination_example.sentence: The Supreme Court's opinion Thursday overruled a pair of <highlight>decades</highlight>-old decisions that states said cost them billions of dollars in lost revenue annually.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最高法院周四的意见推翻了两个几十年前的判决，各州称这两个判决使它们每年损失数十亿美元的收入。

examination_example.sentence: The growth of the use of English as the world's primary language for international communication has obviously been continuing for several <highlight>decades</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英语作为世界主要的国际交流语言，其使用的增多显然已持续数十年。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I re-entered the full-time workforce a few years ago after a <highlight>decade</highlight> of solitary self-employment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几年前，我在自主创业十年后重新回到了全职的工作岗位上。

examination_example.sentence: In a few <highlight>decades</highlight>, artificial intelligence (AI) will surpass many of the abilities that we believe make us special.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 再过几十年，那些我们自认为与众不同，独一无二的能力都将被人工智能 (AI) 所超越。

examination_example.sentence: By the end of the <highlight>decade</highlight>, it's expected to be worth over $50 billion and generate 160 gigawatt-hours.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 预计到2020年，它的价值将超过500亿美元，发电量将达1600亿瓦。

examination_example.sentence: What happens to the centralized electric grid, which took <highlight>decades</highlight> and billions of dollars to build?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花费数十年和数十亿美元建造的集中电网又将何去何从？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: For more than a <highlight>decade</highlight>, FedEx has supported the American Red Cross in its effort to get emergency supplies to areas affected by disasters, both domestically and internationally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 十多年来，联邦快递一直支持美国红十字会向国内和国际受灾地区运送紧急救援物资。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Decades</highlight> of working over coal fires in tight, closed spaces with lite fresh air (to ensure his dishes would not get cold) had fatally damaged his lungs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数十年来，在狭窄封闭的空间中用稀薄的新鲜空气(以确保他的菜不会变冷)在煤火边进行工作，已经严重损害了他的肺部。

examination_example.sentence: Indoor pollution, which includes sources like home heating and cooking, has remained constant over the past several <highlight>decades</highlight> despite advances in the area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 室内污染，包括家庭取暖和烹饪等来源，尽管该地区取得了进步，但在过去几十年中一直保持不变。

examination_example.sentence: The food-as-medicine movement has been around for <highlight>decades</highlight>, but it's making progress as physicians and medical institutions make food a formal part of treatment, rather than relying solely on medications (药物) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以食物作为药物的运动已经存在了几十年，但它正在取得进展，因为医生和医疗机构使食物成为治疗的正式部分，而不是仅仅依靠药物。

examination_example.sentence: Laura Chigi, a grandmother at the march, says the local and national governments have failed to do anything about the crowds for <highlight>decades</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参加游行的老奶奶Laura Chigi说，几十年来，当地政府和国家都没能对游客采取任何措施。

examination_example.sentence: Mike Jia is one of the thousands of Asian-American professionals who have moved to the district in the past <highlight>decade</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迈克·贾(Mike Jia)是过去10年里搬到该地区的数千名亚裔美国上班族之一。

examination_example.sentence: In spite of the dramatic gains women have made in educational attainment and labor force participation in recent <highlight>decades</highlight>, young women view this as a man's world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管近几十年来女性在教育程度和劳动力参与率方面取得了巨大进步，但年轻女性却和中年及老一代女性持相同观点，她们都认为当今世界仍然是男性主导的世界。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It seems that global collapse is certain to happen in some form, possibly within a <highlight>decade</highlight>, certainly within this century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球崩溃似乎肯定会以某种形式发生，可能在10年内，肯定在本世纪内。

examination_example.sentence: A development could bring big changes to a profession that's relied largely on a low-tech approach for <highlight>decades</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一发明可能会给这个几十年来主要依靠低技术方法的行业带来巨大变化。

examination_example.sentence: The decline over the past <highlight>decade</highlight> is steep for teen readers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过去十年来青少年读者的数量急剧下降。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 动词后缀, 与…相关的动作或结果
